title: Anna Vakili snubs Molly-Mae Hague from launch party as Love Island feud rages on
text:
The video will start in 8 Cancel

Get the biggest Daily Love Island stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Anna Vakili has added fuel to the feud fire as she snubbed Molly-Mae Hague from the launch of her new shoe collection.

The 29-year-old Love Island star, who is launching a range with Simmi London, deliberately left Molly-Mae off the guestlist of tonight's launch party.

And the former pharmacist hinted at dark tensions inside the villa that fans never got to see play out on screen.

"People that didn't talk inside still don't," she told Mirror Online.

(Image: SIMMI SHOES)

(Image: ITV/REX)

But she hastily backtracked from slating Islanders by name, saying: "I mean, if I don’t speak to anyone it's mostly because we're just so busy with work."

It came after Anna threw shade at Molly-Mae for failing to ask BFF Yewande Biala to the star-studded launch of her PrettyLittleThing collaboration.

Yewande was left offended by Molly's oversight and took the Instagram influencer to task, joined by Anna.

(Image: SIMMI SHOES)

(Image: SIMMI SHOES)

However, Anna claims the Islanders aren't locked in constant feuds - even when it comes to bagging rival brand deals.

"I think everyone's supportive of each other," she went on.

She also revealed that her close pals since leaving the villa are Amber Gill and Yewande, who she speaks to most - but it's no surprise as they seemed to get very close in the villa this summer.

And pals Harley Brash and Francesca Allen will also be joining her for the launch party tonight - along with sister Mandi, 26.

(Image: SIMMI SHOES)

(Image: Instagram)

It comes after the Love Island star joined her close gal pals on the train to Manchester for Molly's PLT launch.

And while they were being treated to first class seats, themed food and the prospect of a luxury hotel stay that night, Anna seemed to be bored.

She kept staring down at her phone with her headphones plugged in as Amy and Fran excitedly took pictures and videos of each other for Instagram .

(Image: Instagram)

The brunette beauty recently revealed she has quit her job as a pharmacist since her Love Island launch and is now working with brands.

She has some work in the pipeline that can’t yet be revealed.

"You’ll see," Anna laughed, and when asked if she's more of an influencer now, she said: "I guess - that's a bit of a weird title."

*Simmi London x The Vakili Sisters edit is out now
description: EXCLUSIVE: Love Island's Anna Vakili hasn't invited rumoured frenemy Molly-Mae Hague to the launch of her new shoe collection
